author: minfrin
msg: mod_cache: Ignore response headers specified by no-cache=header and
private=header as specified by RFC2616 14.9.1 What is Cacheable. Ensure
that these headers are still processed when multiple Cache-Control
headers are present in the response. PR 54706

author: minfrin
msg: mod_cache: Invalidate cached entities in response to RFC2616 Section
13.10 Invalidation After Updates or Deletions. PR 15868

author: uiterlix
msg: work in progress in component serialization.

author: ddas
msg: Merge -r 1487092:1487093 from trunk onto branch-2. Fixes HDFS-4827.
